system.description: When you use a Device from the World Before, roll +Lore.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: The device malfunctions catastrophically. It either breaks permanently or causes unintended harm.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: The device works as intended, but choose one: it attracts unwanted attention, it requires a significant cost or sacrifice, or it will break after this use.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: The device works perfectly. It does exactly what you need it to do.
